effect.black_white: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.black_2_white_2: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

short_effect.black_white: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.

flavor_text.black_white: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.
